Analysis of the marketable securities contained in the balance sheet items "Debt instruments" (asset item no. 5), "Equities and other non-fixed-income securities" (asset item no. 6), "Other equity investments" (asset item no. 7) and "Shares in affiliated companies" (asset item no. 8) by listed and unlisted securities

Amount of marketable securities not measured at the lower of cost or market value for each of the following balance sheet items: "Debt instruments" (asset item no. 5) and "Equities and other non-fixed-income securities" (asset item no. 6); disclosure about how the securities measured in this way are distinguished from marketable securities measured at the lower of cost or market value

Amount of each balance sheet item attributable to leases, as well as the depreciation, amortisation and write-downs attributable to leased items contained in the item "Depreciation, amortisation and write-downs of tangible and intangible fixed assets (Format 2, Expenses column no. 5, Format 3 No. 11), as well as the lease income contained in the item "Other operating income" (Format 2, Income column no. 8, Format 3 no. 8)

The most significant individual amounts contained in the following items, where these are not immaterial for an assessment of the annual financial statements: "Other assets" (Format 1, asset item no. 14), "Other liabilities" (Format 1, equity and liabilities item no. 5), "Other operating expenses" (Format 2, Expenses column no. 6, Format 3 no. 12), "Other operating income" (Format 2, Income column no. 8, Format 3 no. 8), "Extraordinary expense" (Format 2, Expenses column no. 11, Format 3 no. 21) and "Extraordinary income"
Administration and arrangement services provided to third parties, provided that their scope is materially significant in relation to the overall activities of the institution
Total amount of assets and total amount of liabilities denominated in foreign currencies

Cover calculation separately for the mortgage, ship mortgage and public-sector lending business in accordance with section 28 of the German Pfandbrief Act, and for asset items in the balance sheet the assets designated as cover for issued debt instruments

For the balance sheet items "Receivables from banks" (asset item no. 3) and "Receivables from customers" (asset item no. 4), past due interest and principal repayment amounts for building loans in a single amount, as well as building loans made available but not yet paid out aa) from allotments, bb) for interim and bridging finance and cc) other

For the balance sheet items "Liabilities to banks" (equity and liabilities item no. 1) and "Liabilities to customers" (equity and liabilities item no. 2), changes in the volume of unallotted and allotted home loan savings contracts and contractual total home loan savings amounts

For the balance sheet items "Liabilities to banks" (equity and liabilities item no. 1), "Liabilities to customers" (equity and liabilities item no. 2) and "Securitised liabilities" (equity and liabilities item no. 3), the amounts borrowed in accordance with s. 4(1) no. 5 of the German Building Societies Act

For the balance sheet items "Receivables from banks" (asset item no. 3), "Receivables from customers" (asset item no. 4), "Liabilities to banks" (equity and liabilities item no. 1) and "Liabilities to customers" (equity and liabilities item no. 2), changes in the total amount available for allotment
For the balance sheet item "Receivables from banks" (asset item no. 3), the receivables from the savings bank's own central giro institution contained in the total amount
For the balance sheet item "Liabilities to banks" (equity and liabilities item no. 1), the liabilities to the savings bank's own central giro institution contained in the total amount
For the balance sheet item "Receivables from banks" (asset item no. 3), the receivables from affiliated savings banks contained in the total amount
For the balance sheet item "Liabilities to banks" (equity and liabilities item no. 1), the liabilities to affiliated savings banks contained in the total amount
For the balance sheet item "Receivables from banks" (asset item no. 3), the receivables from the credit cooperative's own cooperative central bank contained in the total amount
For the balance sheet item "Liabilities to banks" (equity and liabilities item no. 1), the liabilities to the credit cooperative's own cooperative central bank contained in the total amount

For the balance sheet item "Receivables from banks" (asset item no. 3), aa) receivables from Deutsche Genossenschaftsbank and bb) receivables from affiliated credit cooperatives contained in the total amount

For the balance sheet item "Liabilities to banks" (equity and liabilities item no. 1), aa) liabilities to Deutsche Genossenschaftsbank and bb) liabilities to affiliated credit cooperatives contained in the total amount

For the balance sheet item "Receivables from banks" (asset item no. 3), the receivables from affiliated banks contained in the total amount and the receivables from regional cooperative central banks contained in that amount

For the balance sheet item "Liabilities to banks" (equity and liabilities item no. 1), the liabilities to affiliated banks contained in the total amount and the liabilities to regional cooperative central banks contained in that amount
For the balance sheet item "Tangible fixed assets" (asset item no. 12): total amount of land and buildings used by the institution in the course of its own activities
For the balance sheet item "Tangible fixed assets" (asset item no. 12): total amount operating and office equipment
For the balance sheet item "Subordinated liabilities" (equity and liabilities item no. 9): amount of expenses incurred for subordinated liabilities

For the balance sheet item "Subordinated liabilities" (equity and liabilities item no. 9): for each borrowing that exceeds ten per cent of the total amount of subordinated liabilities, a) the amount, the currency in which it is denominated, the interest rate and maturity, as well as whether an early redemption option might arise, b) the terms and conditions of subordination and whether it can be converted into capital or another form of debt
For the balance item "Subordinated liabilities" (equity and liabilities item no. 9): the material terms and conditions of other borrowings
For the balance sheet item "Contingent liabilities" (below-the-line item no. 1): nature and amount of each contingent liability that is material in relation to the overall activities of the bank
For each item of liabilities presented in the balance sheet and of below-the-line contingent liabilities, the total amount of assets assigned as security in each case

For the balance sheet item "Other commitments" (below-the-line item no. 2): the nature and amount of each of the commitments designated in sub-items a to c that is material in relation to the overall activities of the bank
Derivative transactions

Derivative transactions in foreign currencies, in particular currency forwards, currency futures, currency swaps, cross-currency swaps, short positions in currency options, currency options, forward transactions in gold and other precious metals, gold and other precious metal futures, short positions in gold options, gold options

Interest-related derivatives, in particular forward transactions in fixed-income securities, interest rate futures, forward rate agreements, short positions in interest rate options, interest rate options, interest rate swaps, obligations to take delivery under forward forward deposits; obligations to deliver under such transactions shall be disclosed in the "Irrevocable loan commitments" balance sheet sub-item (equity and liabilities below-the-line item no. 2 c)

Derivatives to hedge other price risks, in particular equity price-related derivatives, short positions in equity options, equity options, index derivatives, short positions in index options, index options
